DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : The use dalteparin may able prevent complication cause use catheter supply chemotherapy cancer patient . It yet know dalteparin effective reducing complication . PURPOSE : Randomized phase III trial determine effectiveness dalteparin prevent catheter-related complication cancer patient receive chemotherapy catheter .
DOC.brief_title: Dalteparin Prevent Complications Cancer Patients Receiving Chemotherapy Through Catheter
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine dalteparin reduce incidence clinically significant catheter relate complication ( i.e. , asymptomatic catheter relate thrombosis ) cancer patient receive chemotherapy central venous catheter . OUTLINE : This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord treatment center catheter placement ( proximal axilla v distal axilla ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . Arm I : Patients receive dalteparin subcutaneously ( SC ) daily . Arm II : Patients receive placebo SC daily . Treatment continue 16 week catheter removal absence unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow 30 day . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 345 patient ( 230 arm I 115 arm II ) accrue study 6 month .
